âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Playback of major audio formats (FLAC, MP3, MP4, Vorbis, Opus, WavPack, WAV, AIFF, MKA, Musepack, Monkeyâ€™s Audio) â€¢ Native support for VGM and tracker module formats â€¢ Gapless playback â€¢ Play files directly from archives â€¢ Full CUE sheet support
ðŸ“– Summary: fooyin is a customizable music player that supports a wide range of audio formats and provides extensive customization options. It features a plugin system, a scripting language for advanced configuration, and a layout editing mode for complete UI customization. Currently, only Linux is supported, with plans for future platform support.
